channel.title: Weapon speed
channel.description: I've got 2 questions. The first one is: How do I make the attacking speed of my weapon faster. (hits faster after eatchoter) and my 2nd is: How do i make the maul special like in real rs... That it hits imidiatly when u turn on the special

item.title: Weapon speed
item.dc:creator: @by_by_noob by by noob
item.description:
@by_by_noob wrote:

Change the delays in client.java and for the maul, make the special timer 0

Read full topic
